name: Assassin's Creed Syndicate: The Last Maharaja
name_original: Assassin's Creed Syndicate: The Last Maharaja
description:
Assassin's Creed Syndicate: The Last Maharaja is an action game developed by Ubisoft Quebec. It came out on 01-03-2016. It was published by Ubisoft Entertainment. The game is rated as "Meh" on RAWG.
You can play Assassin's Creed Syndicate: The Last Maharaja on PC.
